name: Surfboard Traction Pad - Black Surf Traction Pad, Foam Pro Surf Grip for Shortboard
short_description: Enhanced Grip: Engineered with a high-density, textured surface, our traction pad provides maximum grip, allowing your precise movements and maintain balance throughout your ride.
Durable Material: Crafted from premium foam, this pad is built to withstand the rigors of the ocean, ensuring long-lasting performance and reliability.
Customizable Fit: Available in various sizes and shapes, our traction pad can be easily trimmed to fit any surfboard, offering a personalized fit that caters to your unique surfing style and needs.
Easy Installation: With a peel-and-stick adhesive backing, installing our traction pad is a breeze. Simply clean your surfboard, peel off the backing, and press firmly into place.
Stylish Design: Choose from a range of vibrant color options to match your personality and stand out on the beach.

name: THURSO SURF Lancer 5'10'' Soft Top Foam Surfboard Fish Surf board for Kids & Adults Includes Twin Fins Double Swivel Leash EPS Core IXPE Deck HDPE Slick Bottom Non-Slip Deck Grip - Perfect for Surfing
short_description: EPS Foam EPO Body Armor System
EPS Foam EPO Body Armor System

Beginner-Friendly Design: Crafted With Novice Surfers In Mind, The Thurso Surf 5'10 Soft Top Foam Surfboard Offers A Forgiving And Stable Platform For Easy Learning And Progression. Designed For Effortless Surfing, The Foam Board'S Buoyant Foam Core Ensures You Can Catch Waves With Confidence And Build Essential Surfing Skills.

Enhanced Stability and Safety: Soft Top EPS Foam Core, EPO Bonding System, Heat Laminated HDPE Slick Bottom IXPE Deck Construction Ensures A Stable Platform, Making this 5'10 Fish Surfboard an Excellent Choice for Both Beginner Surfers and Those Seeking to Improve their Balance. Double Swivels and Triple Rail Saver Ankle Leash Offer Enhanced Safety for Both the Rider and Other Surfers, Reducing the Risk of Injuries in Crowded Lineups or Learning Environments.

Optimal Maneuverability: Two Wood Stringers and Twin Fin Setup Provide Exceptional Agility, Allowing Quick and Responsive Turns for A Dynamic Surfing Experience. The Fish'S Wider, Flatter Outline and the Twin Fin Setup Excel in Smaller Waves, Allowing Surfers to Generate Speed and Make Quick Turns Even in Less Powerful Surf.

Versatile Wave Compatibility: Excelling in Small to Medium Waves, This Soft Top Fish Surfboard is Ideal for A Range of Conditions, Suitable for Various Family Members. The Thurso Surf Lancer 5'10 Surfboard is Popular Among Some High Performance Surfers in the Nitro-Small-Wave Hotdogger Range.
Affordability: Soft Top Fish Surfboards are Often More Cost-Effective than Hardboard，Making them An Attractive Choice for Surfers Seeking Quality.

name: Rock-It DA Wizard Performance Soft Top Surfboard, 4’10” / 39L Foam Surfboard for Ocean, Wave Pool, River Surfing and More with 2+1 fin System and Reinforced Deck and Rails Developed in Hawaii (Black)
short_description: SPECS: 4'10" x 19.5" x 2.9" / 39 LITERS OF VOLUME. This is equivalent volume to a fiberglass shortboard of about 6’5”, so the board has plenty of float for adult riders. The shorter size also makes it a board that is easy to handle for younger riders.

PERFORMANCE: 2+1pc Screw Through Fin system with two center fin options included! (3.5" & 2" trailer fin) Tested & proven on the North Shore of Hawaii for high performance ocean, wave pool, and river surfing environments.

DURABILITY: Two wooden nano polymer coated stringers, UV-resistant soft top, reinforced rails, extra thick deck material, reinforced tail, and an additional underlayment below the soft top that helps to provide rigidity and durability through frequent airs, stomping, etc.

SHARK DETERRENT BOTTOM PATTERN: The zebra-striped punk pattern on the bottom of all Rock-It boards is inspired by tests done in Australia that showcase beneficial use of zebra striped patterns to deter sharks

ENVIRONMENT: Made with a focus on durability using environmentally sensitive manufacturing processes. Heat laminated with no harmful dyes, glues, resins or toxins in the production process, and manufactured in a facility that uses collected rainwater. All materials used are recyclable.

name: Performance Soft-Top Surfboard | Handshaped, Fun & Easy to Ride | 5'6" | 7'6" | 8'0" | 9'0"
short_description: Soft Top Surfboard Design: Experience the perfect blend of stability and fun with our soft top surfboard. Ideal for beginners and pros alike, this 8'0" board is crafted for smooth glides, making it an excellent choice for all skill levels.

Light and Durable Construction: Our longboard surfboard features a foam and epoxy fiberglass construction, ensuring it's both light and durable. Unlike traditional soft top surfboard or wavestorm surfboard, the core of this board provides stability and glide.

Easy to Transport and Store: This surf board is lightweight and easy to transport, perfect for spontaneous beach days. Fits comfortably in your car, making it a great companion for outdoor fun. Ideal for adults and kids up to 250 lbs!

No Wax Needed: Say goodbye to the hassle of waxing your board! This soft top surfboard offers a cushy foam surface that's ready to ride. Enjoy more time surfing and less time prepping, ideal for both beginners, kids surfboard, and surf boards adults.

Return Policy: Returns/refunds are available for surfboards that arrive damaged. Due to the high costs of shipping, returns/refunds will not be made for accidental purchases, changes of heart, or instances where a surfboard has been used. Returns/refunds may encounter a re-stocking fee.
